column4: ﻿Hi, I have a HUGE problem. Grub sits on a black screen for about 45 seconds before deciding to appear!!
﻿Hi, I have a HUGE problem. Grub sits on a black screen for about 45 seconds before deciding to appear!!
Ugh, can someone please acknowledge me?
That sounds like a perplexing problem
Sounds like its out of my area of expertice. sorry.
